title: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a virgin girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dream about pregnancy for a virgin girl in a dream. Seeing pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried girl can be a source of anxiety and cause fear and panic, and in all cases the vision does not worry, as it may emphasize the girl’s high character and her distance from the forbidden, or the vision is a message to her and a warning if she You are on the wrong path to stay away from him and away from corrupt company, and this may indicate troubles and troubles, so you are trying to get through this stage with determination and strong faith. Interpretation of a dream about a single girl being pregnant by a certain person is evidence of the expected happiness in a happy marriage in the future. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman In the ninth month, there is evidence of many problems, but they will end. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy that will give birth to an unmarried woman. It indicates overcoming difficulties, the beginning of the crisis, and the end of problems. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman by her lover. Evidence of the completion of marriage if the love is mutual and happiness and pleasure. You may also be interested With: A Prayer for the DeadInterpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single girl. Seeing pregnancy for a girl indicates a lot of good for her. If she is fair, then the vision shows achieving what she wanted and working hard to achieve a wonderful future. Also, seeing pregnancy for a girl who disobeys God indicates problems, troubles, and problems that will occur. And it may cause harm and harm to her family. Also, seeing a pregnant woman with a large belly, and she is in the ninth month, shows many obstacles facing you, but you will overcome them. You may be interested: Talking with the dead in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for an unmarried woman. If a married woman sees that her daughter Pregnant and unmarried, the vision is promising if the girl is righteous and obedient to God and her parents, and it heralds that she will obtain what she desires, as well as marriage and happiness. Family. Also, seeing a girl’s pregnancy indicates that she will soon be engaged or married to a young man of good character who loves her very much. Interpretation of a dream about an illegitimate pregnancy for a single woman: Seeing an illegitimate pregnancy is worrying in a girl’s dream, but if the girl is emotionally attached or engaged to someone and she sees that she is pregnant with this For a person, this is a promising vision and indicates that this person will propose. Marrying her, and if she is engaged to him, this indicates that she is close to marrying him. You may be interested in: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for someone from someone she does not know. If a girl sees that she has married an unknown young man and given birth to him, this indicates her success in life and the continuation of her success. The girl dreams that she She married someone she knew, got pregnant, and was happy with that pregnancy. The vision shows a lot of goodness and abundant money that he will obtain and a prestigious job. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman in the fifth month. Seeing pregnancy in a dream indicates that you will obtain money by participating in a prestigious job or obtaining a university degree from a master’s or doctorate. It also indicates that Fulfilling one's dreams and desires and persevering until one gets what one desires. Pregnancy in the fifth month indicates a crisis and will end soon. You may also be interested in: I saw my husband

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation, the use of henna is one of the ancient legacies that express Arab culture and is used to draw designs on the body or change the hair color to a temporary color. Each detail related to henna has a different interpretation, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of a dream about henna according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna in a dream Ibn Sirin's interpretation You will find the interpretation of dreams about henna in a dream in this article on the Encyclopedia Net website, and we will refer to the interpretation of this dream in all cases. Interpreters see that henna in a dream sometimes indicates goodness and blessings, and at other times it indicates evil, and this we will show. The interpretation of the dream varies according to the dreamer's condition. The interpretation differs depending on whether the dreamer is male or female, married, single or widowed. The psychological state of the dreamer also affects the interpretation of the dream. There have been dozens of dream interpreters over time and they mostly relied on interpreting signs and signals in dreams and linking them to the personal and psychological state of the dreamer. But the Muslim must be completely convinced that fate is entirely in the hands of God Almighty and that no one knows the unseen except God. All interpretations are ultimately jurisprudence that is not based on science or logic, but rather on the basis of inference. Therefore, the dreamer must know the reasons before making any decision. Experts said that the interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that her marriage is approaching, God willing. In this case, henna is a good skin color and a sign of joy, happiness, and change at the same time, God willing. As for if a married woman sees in her dream that she is putting henna on her hand and is happy about it, this means that she will work, God willing, to maintain her home and her husband with all she has. As for if she sees that the henna has been removed from her body with effort and pain, this means that she will go through difficult and difficult circumstances in the coming circumstances. Of course , He must learn how to face and deal with these difficult circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a henna symbol in a dream Henna is used for decoration by women and is usually used in happy occasions and weddings. Therefore, seeing emotional skin in a dream is a good sign that indicates the strength and goodness that fill the dreamer's life, God willing. Henna also indicates the happy and joyful news that the dreamer will learn in the coming days. Therefore, drawing henna on the body is usually a good sign, God willing. This contradicts removing henna if the dreamer sees in a dream that someone is removing henna from his body. This may mean that a major change is coming in the dreamer's life, and that the dreamer's condition will change for the worse in the coming days, unless he thinks calmly and logically before making any decision. If the dreamer has to make a major fateful decision about his work or money, he should think carefully before making it. Interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream indicates marriage and joy, and God knows best. Henna is often reserved for women only and is used in decoration. Therefore, seeing it on a man in a dream may indicate a

title: Interpretation of nails in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a nail in a dream, interpretation of a nail in a dream, is one of the things that carries a lot of meaning and indicates many things to the dreamer, and sometimes it indicates goodness, and is considered a good vision. Other times it does not carry goodness in its aspects, and the meaning depends on the social, psychological and health condition. In this article we will explain some interpretations of seeing a nail in a dream. Interpretation of nails in a dream Seeing a cut nail in a dream is a sign of problems and misfortunes that the dreamer suffers from. If someone sees that he is decorating his nails This means that he will bear many burdens, but he will overcome them all. Seeing someone cutting his nails indicates boredom in the dreamer’s married life and that he is in dire need of change. Seeing the nails white and seeing them with a beautiful appearance in the dream is evidence that the dreamer is on the right path. And he faces many crises. If someone sees short nails in his pajamas and the dreamer is the employer, this means that he will suffer loss and bankruptcy. Seeing long nails means getting a lot of money for the dreamer. Falling nails in a dream means that you feel very sad or You lose all the money at once. Dreaming of cleaning nails. If you see someone cleaning your nails in a dream and you try to clean them, this means that the dreamer has left the door of sin and is on the right path. The dream may indicate a person’s call to approach God and give up sins and disobedience, because cleaning and trimming nails From the Sunnahs of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. If one sees that he is cutting his nails and that he is truly religious, this means that the dreamer’s heart will be sad and he will hear happy news. Interpretation of a nail in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees long nails in a dream means that she has a lot of beauty and shows that she One of the girls who loves decoration. A girl who sees beautiful nails means that she will get a new job, and that she will achieve many important things in her life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is cutting her nails, this means that she will be exposed to a great misfortune, and it indicates the death of one of her relatives. Interpretation of seeing a nail in a dream for a married woman: A married woman who sees black or yellow nails in a dream indicates that the woman will fall ill or fall into some problems. If a married woman sees nails that are longer than necessary, this indicates the death of someone close to her. If a married woman sees nails that are longer than necessary, this indicates the death of someone close to her. That her nails are broken, this means that she will suffer physical harm, but she will recover soon. Seeing a married woman cutting her nails indicates marital problems between her and her husband, but she will overcome these problems in a short time, and if a married woman sees that her nails are ugly, this means that she does not She pays enough attention to her husband. .

title: I dreamed that I was in a place where horses were running

preview.html: I dreamed that I was in a place where horses were running, if I dreamed that I was in a place where horses were running, then this makes me have to interpret the dream of riding horses, and horses in a dream have many interpretations and interpretations that differ and differ according to the situation in which the dreamer is and the interpretation of seeing the dream that I was in A place where horses were running, you need to explain the different situations in which the dreamer sees this dream and interpretations, and in this article we will list these interpretations in detail and we will provide important information in the world of interpretation of dreams and dreams, as this world concerns many people, in their different social classes. . Dreams in general are the mirror through which people see reality and expect it. I dreamed that I was in a place where there were horses. If you dreamed that you were in a place where there were horses, then you need to know the interpretations of interpreters that include this dream, at a time when horses are characterized by a lot of strength and solidity. The Arabs used it everywhere in their time in the Arabian Peninsula, and the horse is the most durable animal. Through the following we will learn about interpretations of dreams about horses: Unruly horses that run violently indicate that the dreamer has bad qualities because of which he will lose control of his life. If the horses run And she crossed the obstacles in front of her, this means that the dreamer’s desires will be fulfilled. Ibn Siri spoke in his interpretation of many horses in a dream that whoever sees them has the ability to bear life’s worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream of many running horses for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream in which there are many running horses for one girl It is one of the important interpretations because of the information it contains about personal life and predicting the future. Girls are more interested in the meanings of dreams and their indications of the future than others, and through the following and knowing the interpretation if I dream that I am in a place where horses are running. We will quote the interpretations of horses running in a woman’s dream: A horse entering a girl’s house in a dream is good news and that her wishes will come true soon and she will get married, God willing. If a girl sees that she is riding a horse and controlling it. This means that she will enjoy great importance and status in society, either by fulfilling desires, or by employing or marrying a rich and beloved young man. If a girl dreams that she will buy horses, this indicates that there is goodness that can be gained and when the dreamer sees a small horse or a pony. This is a sign of marriage to a handsome man. Interpretation of a dream about a brown horse for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about a horse that an unmarried woman sees in a dream differs from one girl to another, and the science of dream interpretation has dealt with all the details related to clarifying these important interpretations through which a girl can know if she She will get married soon, for example, or if bad events or good things happen to her, and through the following we will learn together about these interpretations for an unmarried girl in the hope of clarifying the meaning. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for someone else, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: All you are looking for is to know the interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for another person. The interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for another person in a dream is interpreted with complex meanings based on the shape of the clothes and the type of fabric from which they are made. Jurists said that new clothes differ from old clothes in interpretation, just as going out clothes differ from old clothes. Worn at home, in the following article you will learn about the most accurate interpretations of this vision.You have a dream that confuses you. Wait.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for someone else. When a married man buys new clothes for his children in a dream, he is a strong man and seeks in his life to reach his family and children in the cold of safety, and he also meets all the demands of family members and everyone. The family can move to a high social and economic level if the clothes are expensive. If the mother dreams that she is buying a lot of clothes for her unmarried daughter, this is a sign that she will prepare her for marriage soon. The older sister, if she dreams that she is buying new clothes for her younger sister in the dream, then The vision indicates many responsibilities that she will bring in her life, and she may bear the expenses of her household or seek. To help them in life in one way or another, and if her sister is engaged, then the vision is her marriage. A husband buying a silk dress for his wife is evidence of the bliss and luxury that he provides for her, and that he loves her and gives her all her rights that God and His Messenger have commanded. The dreamer who travels in reality, when he dreams that he buys his His father or mother wears new clothes, travels and succeeds on this journey, and reaps money and success from it. If the visionary has a lot of money and sees that he is buying loose clothes for people he knows instead of the revealing clothes they used to wear, then this helps to cover others and change their personality for the better. Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for someone else by Ibn Sirin: When the dreamer sees that his father bought him beautiful clothes like those worn by kings and princes, this is a great honor and a great relationship that he will enjoy soon, as he spends his life and money on it until he reaches the desired position. The colors of the clothes that the dreamer bought for another person in the dream have hundreds of meanings, but the most important meanings of the colors that appear in the dream will be mentioned, and they are as follows: Green clothes: When a girl buys green clothes for herself and her sister in a dream, they enjoy a greater degree of religiosity and closeness to the Lord of the Worlds. Where they maintain their healthy nature and God gives them blessings and halal food. Pink and pink dresses: When the grandmother sees that she is buying these clothes for her grandchildren, their lives will be bright, and they will get married if they are of marriageable age, and God will give them a happy life full of righteous offspring. White clothes: The jurists disagreed about This dream. A group of them said that this color of clothing symbolizes goodness and the elimination of problems, and another group said that if a dreamer sees a dead person buying him white clothes resembling a shroud, then this is close to him. Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for someone else for single peopleIf an unmarried woman dreams of a young man

title: Interpretation of a dream about lightning in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of lightning in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man or a young man, either strong lightning, seeing lightning and lightning, the sound of thunder in the sky from Ibn Sirin and others. Lightning in a dream is one of the dreams that we see constantly and it causes a state of terror and anxiety in the dreamer because He sees lightning in a dream, and lightning also appears strongly in winter, which warns of a situation. From the rain that will come soon, and the lightning strikes terror and fear into the souls of many people, and we will review the interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream, as interpreted by the famous translator Ibn Sirin in his various interpretations. Interpretation of lightning in a dream Lightning in a dream indicates guidance after misleading, and in the interpretation sometimes it is news. About the return of an absent person, an increase in food, or hearing good news. Lightning in a dream is a light that suddenly appears in the sky, but it is a psychological expression of the presence of positive energy in the dreamer related to work or emotion. Lightning in dreams can indicate hearing happy news if the dreamer sees it lighting up. Heaven or earth, and it can herald a happy event if seen with rain. When lightning appears in a single woman’s dream, it indicates something good in general. It is a sign of good luck and is good news for those who have been waiting for an event. Lightning follows rain, and this has a positive connotation both on a practical and emotional level. Lightning can be associated with feelings of fear if you see it in a dream without rain, and lightning can be a warning to individuals if it is a strange color (such as red, yellow, or orange). If the appearance Lightning is normal in a dream, so this is likely good news, and if an unmarried woman is happy to see it, this indicates a special and happy event that the girl will witness in a few days. Lightning in a person’s dream may indicate a long-awaited guest or a family member. Lightning in a married woman’s dreams can also indicate the arrival of important news related to a long-awaited matter, such as matters related to employment, work, or children’s studies and their success. Lightning in a married woman’s dream can also express a desire in her heart that has become strong or is close to being fulfilled. In waking life, all the natural phenomena that a pregnant woman sees in her sleep and are associated with the sky, such as clouds, meteors, rainbows, etc., are an expression of the loss of problems and worries. Lightning in a pregnant woman’s sleep on a male child if he desires it naturally. Lightning in a man’s dream indicates good news and a good indicator or good event, especially in matters related to profits, work, or money. Lightning in a dream or a man’s dream indicates the presence of positive energy latent in Himself, which will allow him to succeed in the job he seeks. title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting the stomach in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about being stabbed in the stomach in a dream We may find that the dream interpretation of being stabbed in the stomach in a dream is one of the most disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must be righteous and in absolute disbelief because it is from the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth that it can Being stabbed in the stomach in a dream can indicate a lot of good that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees herself stabbed in the stomach With a knife, this may indicate that she will give birth soon and in good health thanks to God. It is possible to see a stabbed knife in a dream, as this indicates good things coming to the dreamer and the fulfillment of dreams. Dreaming of a knife in the abdomen in a dream can indicate closeness to the Blessed and Most High God, and stops sins. And the disobedience that the dreamer committed in the past, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a small crocodile in a dream: Hitting a small crocodile in a dream may indicate that he is committing some forbidden and sinful acts and that he must rely on God. In the event that a person sees that he is being beaten by a small crocodile, then he may This indicates his victory over enemies thanks to God’s grace. If one sees that he is hitting a small crocodile, this may indicate the challenges that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Dreaming of hitting a small crocodile in a dream could indicate the achievements that the dreamer has achieved in his life during This period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a doll in a dream: Anyone who dreams of hitting a doll may indicate the strength of mind and control of insight that he has in his life at that time. Hitting a doll in a dream could indicate getting rid of the problems and difficulties that the dreamer was facing in His life at that time. If one sees that he is hitting the doll, this may indicate the end of a difficult period that the dreamer was going through in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing a doll hitting in a dream indicates financial crises that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about beating someone and blood coming out in a dream. A person hitting someone and blood flowing from him may indicate financial crises that the dreamer may face in those days. In the case of his personal opinion that he was hitting another person and blood came out of him, this may indicate that he will be exposed to some difficulties and problems in his life. His life during those days. In the event that someone believes that he was beating another person and blood flowed from him, this may indicate that there are some problems in his family life and he must seek help from God. Interpretation of a dream about hitting someone who wants to attack me in a dream. Hitting a person who wanted to attack you in a dream may indicate To abundance and goodness for the dreamer on those days. In the event that one believes that he was hitting someone who attacked him, this may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during these days. It is possible to see hitting someone who wants to attack you, this indicates that he will be overcome The problems and difficulties he faced

title: Interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream and the clearest indications of this vision. Seeing a dead person in a dream is one of the most common visions among dreamers, as they see this dream in different situations. Some of them see the deceased in a state of happiness or sadness, or giving a gift to the dreamer, and others also see that he is suffering from an illness or in a state of anger, but according to the interpretations of senior scholars, seeing death in a dream is one of the visions that convey many important messages directed to the dreamer or the deceased himself. What are the clearest indications and is it a good or bad vision? Learn in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the dead in a dream by Ibn SirinIf the dreamer sees in a dream that he is talking to a dead person, then this vision is a reassuring message to him that this dead person is in a good place in the afterlife. However, if the dreamer dreams that the dead wants to give him something like food, then this vision shows how much this dead person needs someone to give him alms and supplications. The dreamer’s vision of the dead in a state of anger indicates that this vision is a warning message to the dreamer of the need to repent to God, because this vision shows that he has committed sins in reality. One of the symbols of the dead talking to the living in a dream is that it indicates the longevity of the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dead in a dream by Al-NabulsiAs for the interpretation of Imam Al-Nabulsi, seeing the dead in a dream with an ugly appearance or illness is one of the ugly visions that indicate the sins and transgressions that the dead committed before his death. If one sees the dead silent, then this vision is an indication of the dead’s dissatisfaction with him because of his action that caused his anger. If the dreamer sees his deceased father, then he cries, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is going through great difficulties and crises in reality. In the case of a conversation The deceased is with the dreamer and he was accused and reprimanded, this vision is an indication of the sins and transgressions that he commits in reality and he must return to God to repent. In general, seeing the deceased crying in a dream indicates visions of hatred that indicate the extent of one's need for charity and supplication for him. Seeing the dead in a dream for singles As for the interpretation of this vision for an unmarried girl, in the case of talking to him, this vision is one of the visions worthy of praise for her, which indicates kindness and food. If the deceased in the dream of an unmarried girl is her brother, this vision is good for her to fulfill her desires in reality. And if she sees a dead father, this vision is good news for her that she will marry a man of good morals and religion, and God knows best. Seeing the deceased sad in a dream means that this deceased had a debt before his death and this debt must be paid. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream for a married woman As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, talking to the deceased is one of the promising visions for her of kindness and food, as well as in the case of seeing getting food from the deceased. In the case of eating with the deceased, this vision is good news for her For her husband, this vision indicates that she will find a new job opportunity. Seeing the deceased father of a married woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dried figs in a dream for one girl: Seeing dried figs in a dream for one girl. It shows that she will soon marry a rich man and he will be the reason for her great happiness. A dream of one girl eating dried figs with many friends. It is a warning vision from these friends, they are not bad friends, And God knows best. Seeing dried figs in a girl’s dream had a bad taste. It is an indication of the bad reputation of the girl’s owner, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees dried figs in a dream, they taste delicious. It is a sign of the fulfillment of desires and goals in her life. The vision may indicate Also, a lot of money for the dreamer without fatigue or effort may be a sudden inheritance. For an unmarried girl who is a student, when she dreams of seeing dried figs in a dream, this is considered a good opportunity to succeed with distinction. Seeing dried figs in a dream for an unmarried girl is suffering from heartache or distress. In a dream. It is a metaphor for the ability of the visionary to abandon these fears and resolve anxiety. See also: Interpretation of seeing figs in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of seeing dried figs in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees dried figs in her dream is a symbol of food, goodness, and blessings in her life. The dream of Dried figs in a married woman’s dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through a major crisis, but he was able to solve it and overcome it. Seeing dried figs in abundance in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of marital life. In the case where a married woman dreams of seeing dried figs but their taste is bad. It is a sign of a major disagreement with her husband, and God knows best. But if a married woman who is late in getting married sees that she is eating dried figs in a dream with her husband, this is good news about pregnancy. Seeing dried figs with a good taste and good smell in a dream for a married woman is a symbol. For the good offspring of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing dried figs in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a person sees dried figs in his dream, this is a sign that the doors of lawful livelihood will open before the dreamer. And a man who sees dried figs in a dream of excellent quality is a sign that he will obtain a new promotion. He desires it. A person who is in debt or who is going through a financial crisis dreams that he buys dried figs in a dream. It is a good omen for relief and overcoming debt, and God knows best. Seeing dried figs in a married man’s dream indicates stability in his life with his wife. And a person who sees himself taking dried figs from A familiar person in a dream. It is an indication that the dreamer is benefiting from that person who appeared to him in the dream. As for the man who dreams of seeing dried figs and wants to eat them but could not. It is a metaphorical expression of the viewer’s inability to reach his desires. The citizen who sees figs Dry figs in a dream means that he has decided to return to his homeland and his family, and God knows best. As for the man who dreams of seeing dried figs in a dream, they taste bad. It is a metaphor that the fortuneteller earns his money from forbidden and illegal sources. It is a warning vision for him and he must repent to God.
